title._content: Image taken from page 199 of 'C. Frommel's pittoreskes Italien. Nach dessen Original-Gemälden und Zeichnungen. Die Scenen aus dem Volksleben nach Zeichnungen von Catel, Gail, Goetzloff, Mosbrugger, Weller, Pinelli, etc. In Stahl gestochen von C. Frommel

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "C. Frommel's pittoreskes Italien. Nach dessen Original-Gemälden und Zeichnungen. Die Scenen aus dem Volksleben nach Zeichnungen von Catel, Gail, Goetzloff, Mosbrugger, Weller, Pinelli, etc. In Stahl gestochen von C. Frommel und H. Winkler. Text für Ober-Italien von W. von Lüdemann, Unter-Italien von C. Witte, etc" Author: LUEDEMANN, Wilhelm von. Contributor: CATEL, Franz. Contributor: FROMMEL, Carl. Contributor: GAIL, W. Contributor: PINELLI, Bartolomeo. Contributor: WELLER, Theodor Leopold. Contributor: WINKLES, Henry. Contributor: WITTE, Johann Heinrich Friedrich Carl. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10129.d.13." Page: 199 Place of Publishing: Leipzig Date of Publishing: 1840 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002280816 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
